sentence.text: However, the expression and precise role of sex determination in osteosarcoma remain unclear.
To elucidate the cellular and molecular function of sex determination, we examined the consequences of SOX3 knockdown in osteosarcoma cells.
We found that the downregulation of sex determination inhibited the proliferation, migration and invasion of osteosarcoma cells.

Taken together, our data indicate that sex determination may serve as an oncogene in osteosarcoma, and SOX3 downregulation may prove to be a novel approach for the inhibition of osteosarcoma progression
